tool_description: Predicts optimal harvest timing based on crop maturity, weather conditions, and quality factors to maximize yield and minimize losses.

crop_maturity_stage.description: Current crop maturity: early, mid, late, or ready

weather_forecast.description: Daily precipitation forecast for next 10 days in mm

error_messages: Invalid moisture content: Must be between 10 and 50 percent.
Insufficient weather forecast: Need 7-10 days of precipitation forecast.
Premature harvest assessment: Crop must be at least at 'mid' maturity stage for harvest timing.
usage: Provide current crop maturity stage, moisture content, and precipitation forecast. Returns optimal harvest timing recommendations based on weather windows and crop conditions.

harvest_urgency.description: Harvest urgency level: low, moderate, or high

weather_window_days.description: Number of favorable weather days available

quality_risk.description: Risk to crop quality if delayed: minimal, moderate, or severe
